title: Ably API Requests Client Event
description: A message sent on the clientEvents:apiRequests metachannel describing a sampled client api request.

host.description: The HTTP Host header of the API request.

requestId.description: The unique ID of the request that Ably can use to correlate a request event with internal logs, if necessary.

site.description: The site the request was processed in.

headers.description: The HTTP headers sent with the request. Keys should be lower case.

query.description: The details of the parsed request query, including information such as the request format.

path.description: The path of the endpoint called in the request, for example /channels/{channel-name}/messages.

channels.description: A list of channels the request was made against.

error.description: The details of any error encountered whilst making the request. It includes an error message, error code and HTTP status code.
